works.description:
Taking movies with different formats and burning them to a high-definition DVD that will seamlessly play on Blu-ray players has just got simpler. Shedworx has announced the availability of the latest 3D software which will enable users of Panasonic 3D video cameras to edit their high-definition videos.
In order to render sublime performance, the company has enhanced its widely-known RevolverHD for Mac users. By taking advantage of the updated version, users can conveniently edit their 3D movies for an immersive experience. The 3D camera range from Panasonic has been shipping with 3D video editing software for the user’s desktop.
